introduction.text: If you've ever felt dismissed by conventional medicine, you're not alone. At AYURFEM, we believe every woman deserves personalized care that honors both her body's wisdom and evidence-based science.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: AYURFEM was founded on a simple belief: every woman deserves healthcare that listens. Too many women have been dismissed, told their symptoms are 'normal,' or given one-size-fits-all solutions that don't address root causes. We're here to change that.

story.title: Our Story
story.text: After years of personal struggle with hormonal imbalances and finding little help in conventional medicine, our founder discovered Ayurveda—India's 5,000-year-old system of natural healing. This ancient wisdom, combined with modern research, transformed her health and ignited a passion to help other women experience the same.

values.value2Desc: No two women are alike; neither are our approaches.
values.value3Desc: We educate and equip you to take charge of your health.
values.value4Desc: Ethically sourced herbs and eco-conscious practices.
